{"id":299537629,"lang":"python3","time":"1 year, 4 months","timestamp":1580636990,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"72 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/299537629/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"12.6 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def addTwoNumbers(self, l1: ListNode, l2: ListNode, carry=0) -> ListNode:\n        \"\"\"O(max(l1, l2) time | O(1) space)\"\"\"\n        head = None\n        prev = None\n        carry = 0\n        while l1 or l2:\n            left = right = 0\n            if l1:\n                left = l1.val\n                l1 = l1.next\n            if l2:\n                right = l2.val\n                l2 = l2.next\n            node = ListNode((left + right + carry)%10)\n            carry = (left + right + carry) // 10\n            if prev is None:\n                head = node\n                prev = node\n            else:\n                prev.next = node\n                prev = node\n        if carry > 0:\n            node.next = ListNode(carry)\n        return head","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers"}
